origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.analyze_social_media', 'description': 'This function retrieves social media analysis reports for a specified cryptocurrency over a given time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency to analyze, e.g., Dogecoin.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the analysis, e.g., weekly, monthly.'}, {'name': 'reportCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of reports to retrieve.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'The list of social media analysis reports.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.analyze_social_media, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Dogecoin', 'timeFrame'是'weekly', 'reportCount'是'5'.
